name: Indy House of Pilates
description: Offers a variety of Pilates equipment classes, group fitness classes, and therapeutic services

name: Eclipse Classical Pilates
address: 960 E Washington St, Suite C, Indianapolis, IN 46204
description: Focuses on making Pilates accessible to everyone, offering small group classes, open gym, and private lessons

name: Voltage Pilates
description: Teaches the authentic approach to Joseph Pilates' method using original equipment, offering private lessons, apparatus classes, and mat classes

name: Club Pilates Downtown Indy
description: A reformer Pilates studio offering various class levels from beginner to advanced

name: Era Pilates
description: Offers expert-led Pilates classes in Reformer, Tower, Chair, and Mat Pilates, with a focus on an authentic, system-based approach

name: Reforming Indy
description: Provides Pilates, fitness, and barre classes at two locations, emphasizing personalized attention and a supportive community

name: SoulCore (at Saint Elizabeth Ann Seton Catholic Church)
description: SoulCore is a Catholic-based fitness program that combines the prayers of the rosary with a core-strengthening workout. Classes are held at various Catholic churches

name: JCC Indianapolis
description: Offers Pilates classes as a benefit of membership, focusing on building strength, toning muscles, and improving body awareness

name: Marian University
description: While not exclusively a Pilates studio, Marian University is a Catholic university that offers fitness facilities, which may include Pilates classes for students

name: Pietra Fitness
address: Various locations, search for instructors on their website
description: Pietra Fitness is a faith-based fitness program that integrates prayer with exercise, drawing inspiration from Catholic traditions. They have certified instructors across the country
